Update Paper Info

Source: R/crossref.R
paper_info.Rd

Check OpenAlex and/or CrossRef for paper info and update the paper object accordingly to fix import problems.

Usage

paper_info(paper)

Arguments

paper

a papercheck paper object or list

Value

the updated paper object

Examples

ps1 <- paper_info(psychsci[[1]])
